CustomField.description: Used for internal calculation. If value is SOQL, it must return an Aggregate result with label as 'rslt', e.g. select count(id)rslt from account
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for internal calculation. If value is SOQL, it must return an Aggregate result with label as 'rslt', e.g. select count(id)rslt from account
CustomField.label: Controller Value
